1338660.name: Arcano
1338660.description:
Arcano is an over the top action adventure in VR. Playing as a secret agent, you'll make the impossible possible. Slow-motion shootouts and crazy stunts at a variety of exciting locations.

Set in a time where elected politicians have no power to influence the world anymore, and rich companies control everything. A secret group called Arcano has emerged to keep bad actors in check, and they're looking for agents — this is where you come in!

GAMEPLAY

Take on bite-sized missions, either solo or with a friend in online co-op. Find yourself in exciting high-risk situations at a variety of locations.

Have intense shootouts and dodge bullets in slow-motion. Catch and throw live grenades. Climb, fly drones, use gadgets, and hide from guards.

PAY IF YOU WANT

Try Arcano for free and buy more missions if you want!
1338660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
